patthana14.15:1.1: Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:2.1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:3.1: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.15:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
